name: Kocmoc Gopnik - Hard Bass in Space
name_original: Kocmoc Gopnik - Hard Bass in Space
description:
The earth is invaded from kocmoc.Comrade Slav has a secret weapon.He has a mission to save the world with power of Hard Bass.Reach for the kocmoc,unleash the power of Kocmoc Gopnik and defeat invaders.

Hard Bass by Alan Aztec,uamee,XS Project,Hard Bass School and of course Cheeki Breeki Hard Bass anthem.

Cheeki Breeki chiptune by Linear Monolithic.

Graphic by Beovuliin ,Craftpix,Game Art 2D,Aetherna and Sauer2 from Opengameart
